title: Twenty Percent Time
description: Two developers from [Tighten](https://tighten.co/) discuss one programming topic every Friday in less than 20 minutes.

_fireside.subtitle: Two developers from Tighten discuss one programming topic every Friday in less than 20 minutes.

items.title: Single Table Inheriance
items.content_text: LARACON NEXT WEEK! We do recent PRs and Single Table Inheritance.Links:Add @auth blade component by m1guelpf · Pull Request #20087 · laravel/frameworkAdd blade directive @guest by LKDevelopment · Pull Request #20114 · laravel/framework[5.5] Let Str::is handles many patterns by lucasmichot · Pull Request #20108 · laravel/framework
items.content_html:
LARACON NEXT WEEK! We do recent PRs and Single Table Inheritance.

Links:

  • Add @auth blade component by m1guelpf · Pull Request #20087 · laravel/framework
  • Add blade directive @guest by LKDevelopment · Pull Request #20114 · laravel/framework
  • [5.5] Let Str::is handles many patterns by lucasmichot · Pull Request #20108 · laravel/framework
items.summary: LARACON NEXT WEEK! We do recent PRs and Single Table Inheritance.

items.title: (Not) Customizing Laravel
items.content_text: Links:[5.5] Add missing empty statements. by lucasmichot · Pull Request #19975 · laravel/framework[5.5] Add Collection::wrap method by thecrypticace · Pull Request #20055 · laravel/framework[5.5] Add unwrap to collection by sileence · Pull Request #20068 · laravel/framework[5.5] Use listensFor instead of hears for event listener self-registration by BrandonShar · Pull Request #19962 · laravel/frameworkSelf-registering event listeners by adamwathan · Pull Request #19917 · laravel/frameworkAdd the the str_before extra helper, it's the inverse of str_after by afsardo · Pull Request #19940 · laravel/framework
items.content_html:
Links:

  • [5.5] Add missing empty statements. by lucasmichot · Pull Request #19975 · laravel/framework
  • [5.5] Add Collection::wrap method by thecrypticace · Pull Request #20055 · laravel/framework
  • [5.5] Add unwrap to collection by sileence · Pull Request #20068 · laravel/framework
  • [5.5] Use listensFor instead of hears for event listener self-registration by BrandonShar · Pull Request #19962 · laravel/framework
  • Self-registering event listeners by adamwathan · Pull Request #19917 · laravel/framework
  • Add the the str_before extra helper, it's the inverse of str_after by afsardo · Pull Request #19940 · laravel/framework
items.summary: We discuss recent PRs, our tolerance for laravel customization, and a cool new helper function!

items.title: Images
items.content_text: Images. Where do you put them? What are they called? Thumbnails? Big ones? Ahh?!?!Links:[5.5] Allow macros to be registered using classes (in addition to closures) by sebastiaanluca · Pull Request #19782 · laravel/framework[5.5] Add Route::view() helper by brayniverse · Pull Request #19835 · laravel/framework[5.4] Make Arr::random($array, 1) return an array of one item by vlakoff · Pull Request #19826 · laravel/framework[5.5] Add Route::redirect() method by brayniverse · Pull Request #19794 · laravel/framework[5.5] [Concept] PSR-11 compliant container by deleugpn · Pull Request #19822 · laravel/frameworkWatch Ryan Singer - Design: Case Study from Laracon US!54: Jonathan Reinink - Forms: The Worst Part of Web Dev | Full Stack Radio
items.content_html:
Images. Where do you put them? What are they called? Thumbnails? Big ones? Ahh?!?!

Links:

  • [5.5] Allow macros to be registered using classes (in addition to closures) by sebastiaanluca · Pull Request #19782 · laravel/framework
  • [5.5] Add Route::view() helper by brayniverse · Pull Request #19835 · laravel/framework
  • [5.4] Make Arr::random($array, 1) return an array of one item by vlakoff · Pull Request #19826 · laravel/framework
  • [5.5] Add Route::redirect() method by brayniverse · Pull Request #19794 · laravel/framework
  • [5.5] [Concept] PSR-11 compliant container by deleugpn · Pull Request #19822 · laravel/framework
  • Watch Ryan Singer - Design: Case Study from Laracon US!
  • 54: Jonathan Reinink - Forms: The Worst Part of Web Dev | Full Stack Radio
items.summary: Images. Where do you put them? What are they called? Thumbnails? Big ones? Ahh?!?!

items.title: Resources (bonus outro with North Meets South)
items.content_text:
We talk about resources.
At the end we have a little clip of our guest appearance on North Meets South (http://www.northmeetssouth.audio/) with Michael Dyrynda and Jacob Bennett.
items.content_html:
We talk about resources.
At the end we have a little clip of our guest appearance on North Meets South (http://www.northmeetssouth.audio/) with Michael Dyrynda and Jacob Bennett.
items.summary:
We talk about resources.
At the end we have a little clip of our guest appearance on North Meets South (http://www.northmeetssouth.audio/) with Michael Dyrynda and Jacob Bennett.

items.title: Naming Things
items.content_text: This week we talk about the only thing in programming, Naming Things. Caleb wants to write a Bob the Builder book.
items.content_html: This week we talk about the only thing in programming, Naming Things. Caleb wants to write a Bob the Builder book.
items.summary: This week we talk about the only thing in programming, Naming Things. Caleb wants to write a Bob the Builder book.

items.title: Routes
items.content_text: We talk about the routes file, Route:resource(), conditional redirects, and talk about some PRs.
items.content_html: We talk about the routes file, Route:resource(), conditional redirects, and talk about some PRs.
items.summary: We talk about the routes file, Route:resource(), conditional redirects, and talk about some PRs.

items.title: Model Traits
items.content_text:
We talk about feature traits in Eloquent Models.
Caleb wants a utopian world where all models are just a list of traits.
Daniel is very reasonable.
items.content_html:
We talk about feature traits in Eloquent Models.
Caleb wants a utopian world where all models are just a list of traits.
Daniel is very reasonable.
items.summary:

Daniel is very reasonable.

items.title: Model Factories
items.content_text: We talk about our favorite topic.Links:Model Factory "lazy" method (github PR)Set a model factory attribute to a factory instance (github PR)artisan make:factory coming to Laravel 5.5 (github commit)
items.content_html:
We talk about our favorite topic.

Links:

  • Model Factory "lazy" method (github PR)
  • Set a model factory attribute to a factory instance (github PR)
  • artisan make:factory coming to Laravel 5.5 (github commit)
items.summary: We talk about our favorite topic.

items.title: Eloquent Contexts
items.content_text:
We talk today about the differences between Model, Collection, and Query Builder contexts in Laravel's Eloquent ORM.


Github ->get() thread
Github ->make() PR
Links:"->get()" method Github thread"make" method Github PR
items.content_html:
We talk today about the differences between Model, Collection, and Query Builder contexts in Laravel's Eloquent ORM.

  • Github ->get() thread
  • Github ->make() PR

Links:

  • "->get()" method Github thread
  • "make" method Github PR
items.summary: We talk today about the differences between Model, Collection, and Query Builder contexts in Laravel's Eloquent ORM.

items.title: Macros
items.content_text:
We discuss Laravel Macros, and wander off into talking about setting up Laravel relationships before saving.

Caleb's post about macros is here: https://blog.tighten.co/the-magic-of-laravel-macros
items.content_html:
We discuss Laravel Macros, and wander off into talking about setting up Laravel relationships before saving.

Caleb's post about macros is here: https://blog.tighten.co/the-magic-of-laravel-macros
